# Bharat Matrimony – Partner Preference Logic for prospect

**Focus Region:** North India (Hindi Belt)  


## Measurement & Display Standards (Global)

### Measurement Units
- Preferred Age: Yrs (e.g., 32 Yrs)
- Preferred Height: Ft–Inch (e.g., 5.8")
- Preferred Annual Income: lakhs

---

## your matching score value( fixed )

your matching score : 18/20  

---
## preferred Age value

Male prospect (Age = X Yrs): Show preferred age range X-6 - X  yrs
Female prospect (Age = X Yrs): Show preferred age range X - X+6 yrs

---
## preferred height value

Male prospect (Height = X ft): Show preferred height range X-3" - X ft
Female prospect (Height = X ft): Show preferred height range X - X+3 ft

---

## preferred marital status value

same to same whatever marital status of propect is.

---

## preferred Mothe tongue value (fixed)

preferred mother tongue : Hindi, Brij, Awadhi,Maithali, Punjabi.

---
## preferred Physical Status value (fixed)

preferred Physical Status : Normal      

---
## preferred drinking habit value (fixed)

preferred drinking habit : No

---
## preferred smoking habit value (fixed)

preferred smoking habit : No

---
## preferred Eating Habits value (fixed)

preferred eating habits : Vegetarian

---
## preferred religion value (fixed)

preferred religion : Hindu

---
## preferred caste value

preferred caste : show all caste of the same group of prospect's caste.

---
## preferred star value

preferred star : show any random star from the list.

---

## preferred Dosham value (fixed)

preferred dosham :  No

---
## preferred education value

preferred education : show all the education of the same group of prospect's education.

---
## preferred occupation value (fixed)

preferred occupation : Any

---
##preferred employment value (fixed)

preferred employment : Private sector

---
## preferred Annual Income value

Male prospect (Annual Income = X Lakhs): show preferred annual income range 1 - X+5 Lakhs
Female prospect (Annual Income = X Lakhs): show preferred annual income range X - X+20 Lakhs

---
## preferred country value (fixed)

preferred country : India
